# GGMnonreg

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/donaldRwilliams/GGMnonreg.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/donaldRwilliams/GGMnonreg)

The goal of GGMnonreg is to estimate non-regularized Gaussian graphical models.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("donaldRwilliams/GGMnonreg")
```
